entry.title: HPC Training Launches Site
entry.content: Launching simple training website using GitHub Pages, and Jekyll and I can use Markdown to author my posts. It actually is a lot easier than I thought it was going to be, thanks to the help of the JONATHAN MCGLONE @ http://jmcglone.com/guides/github-pages/.

entry.title: Hank Quinlan, Horrible Cop, Launches Site
entry.content: Well. Finally got around to putting this old website together. Neat thing about it - powered by Jekyll and I can use Markdown to author my posts. It actually is a lot easier than I thought it was going to be. Thanks to the help of the JONATHAN MCGLONE @ http://jmcglone.com/guides/github-pages/.
